dct_description_sm: This polygon shapefile layer represents the U.S. Congressional Districts boundaries for the City of New York, with water included. These district boundaries represent the redistricting as of the US Census 2010. This file was generated from the 17B release of the Department of City Planning's LION file.
dct_publisher_sm: New York (City). Department of City Planning
dct_title_s: 2010 New York City U.S. Congressional Districts (Water Areas Included)
dct_spatial_sm: New York, New York, United States
